title: [CLIENT] Can't Launch Client (LoLClient.exe - Bad Image)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I first posted this into report a bug, but it doesn't seem like it caught your attention.
Launching client has become impossible no matter how I do it now, just earlier today, I could open legacy client straight from Razer Cortex, but now, the legacy client leads to this issue as well. 

Repairing client currently, this bug of some sort needs to be fixed.

Running on Windows 8 i5

replies.body: had the same thing for months, also still no response.

What happens if you try launching League directly instead of through Cortex?  It's likely that the patcher is trying to locate your game files and launch but is getting lost or blocked.  let me know if that does the trick.
